thread.title: Gerald
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Gerald

author: Gerald
title: Gerald
text: At age 18, that's 68 years ago!, had my very first air ticketing experience -- and have been traveling internationally every year since, often, many times per year. This time with Alpha Flight Guru -- or was it that super-special rep I worked with, Victor Yousseff ? -- is the best-ever experience I've had with ticketing! Victor went above, over and beyond -- to get me to Paris, Budapest and back -- a process, that I know from my experience, had a) the best possible terminal/flight connections and b) best/fairest price. I shall return! (To Alpha Flight Guru -- and Victor, of course.)
